titleStmt.title: A sermo[n] preached at Pawles Crosse on Sunday the thirde of Nouember 1577. in the time of the plague, by T.W.
titleStmt.author: White, Thomas, ca. 1550-1624.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from STC; month date from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Quire B has been replaced with quire B of "A sermon preached at Paules Crosse on Sunday the ninth of December. 1576".
